repeater.note1: Please use standard browser - Edge, Chrome, Safari or Firefox to ensure PDJ Media Repeater can work correctly.
repeater.note2: For Android Phone in China, please use Official
repeater.note3: Other browsers may not support uttering translation lines with system TTS(will auto switch to online TTS service), or may hijack video or audio tag to make PDJ media repeater losing control of the media file.

repeater.timestampMoveEnd: Move of EndTime for all subtitles (in ms):
repeater.tempSpeed: Show Temporary Playback Speed Toggle - This button allows for convenient real-time temporary adjustment of playback speed. All subsequent repeats will play using this temporary speed.
repeater.showRetracePlay1: Display the 'Rewind Play' button that rewinds playback by
repeater.showRetracePlay2: seconds with each click (But will not go back beyond the start time of the current sentence).
repeater.showArrow: Display Switch Sentence Buttons on PC browser.
repeater.autoSwitchtoNextSentence: Auto Switch to Next Sentence (Disabled while editing)
repeater.utterSubtitle: Utter Subtitle's Translation Line with TTS
repeater.notSystemTTSnote: The default TTS API address maybe invalid. You can change it to any other online (get interface) TTS API address (Test it firstly). e.g.: http://api.voicerss.org/?key={key1}&hl=zh-cn&c=MP3&v=Wang&r=0&f=16khz_16bit_stereo&src=  Or azure-tts:defaultKey1,eastasia,zh-CN-YunyiMultilingualNeural
repeater.TTSSetting: If the uttering fails, it may be due to incorrect TTS API parameters or excessive call frequency. When using voiceRSS, the daily call limit is 350 times. 'c3c059ecf47e489c8db0d038867e75c1' can be replaced with '66e82191c8df46dc8e03e217ae557f91'. Users can also apply for a free account (email required) and replace the key value in the address; When using Azure TTS, you can replace 'defaultKey1,eastasia' with 'defaultKey2,eastus' or 'defaultKey3,southeastasia'. Please test before use, as these built-in default values may become invalid (except the first one). Users can also apply for a free Azure account and activate TTS free (F0) services, and replace 'defaultKey1,eastasia' with the 'subscription key,region value' of your own account. For example: azure-tts:d5da5b312758xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx,eastasia,zh-CN-YunyiMultilingualNeural.  'zh-CN-YunyiMultilingualNeural' can be replaced with other speakers supported in the region, which can be queried here using a computer browser: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/speech-service/language-support?tabs=tts#text-to-speech, for example: 'en-US-AriaNeural', 'zh-CN-XiaoshuangNeural'.
repeater.ttsWrong: Error uttering content using online TTS!
repeater.lineNumOfTrans: Line Number Of Translation In Subtitle:
repeater.voice: Voice (Your browser has {totalvoices} voices for this language, including online voices):
repeater.replayFromStart: SingleClick to Replay Current Sentence from the First Time
repeater.autoPauseAfterFirstDone: AutoPause After Uttering Translation Line or Playing Current Sentence Firstly, And Click To Continue.
repeater.dubbingMode: When playing in Regular Mode, enable the dubbing function (simultaneously playing media and reading translations using TTS, you can manually adjusting the media volume).
repeater.playFullFavList: Play All Favorite Sentenses in Current User's Root Folder When Playing Favorite List (In this mode, autoPlay current sentence is not allowed due to browser's restriction.)
repeater.autoCloseCheck: Turn off 'Dictation Check' automatically when switching sentences in Dictation and Shadowing Recording mode.
repeater.ignoreC: Ignore capitalization and punctuation at the end of words when 'Dictation Check' in Dictation and Shadowing Recording mode.
repeater.wavesurfer: Enable Visual waveform chart by default in editing mode in a non-mobile browser . Click
repeater.wavesurfer2: to switch. Note: When turning on this visual waveform chart in a mobile browser mannually, if the media file is too large, the browser may crash. You can clear up the browser's caches on the login page and try again, or visit it in a computer browser first. After successfully loading the visualization waveform for the first time, the system will automatically save the peak data of this media file to current user's /!PDJ folder on the server, this media file will no longer cause browser crashes in the future. (If the waveform cannot be displayed for a long time, it may be due to the media file being too large or insufficient browser cache space.)
repeater.allowCache: Cache Media - Enable to Save Visited Media Files in Browser's Cache. This will hugely save traffic usage in the next visit, but will take up storage space on this device (This setting's default value is true, and will only be saved in current browser cache after being changed). In 'Offline APP Mode', 'Cache Media' will be automatically selected.
repeater.cached1: Max number of latest files to cache:
repeater.savedfiles: Number of media files saved in this Browser's Cache: {numOfKeys}
repeater.offlineApp: Offline APP mode - Please change this setting on the login page. The offline APP mode can be used normally with or without network, and will prioritize the use of files in the browser cache.  When there is no network (client cannot connect to the network or server is turned off), uncached files will not be displayed. In this mode, editing subtitles and settings can still be performed. All changes will be stored in the browser cache and will not be saved to the server, and can be updated to the server with your permission after turning off this mode (If there are important modifications, do not forget to switch to non offline APP mode in a timely manner to synchronize to the server). Offline APP mode will automatically log in with the account information in the cache. The non offline APP mode can only be used online and will update the server content to the browser cache (the resources in the 'media cache' are stored in a dedicated database and are not controlled by this). In non offline APP mode, all modifications will be automatically saved to the browser cache and updated in real-time to the server.
repeater.saveUnsavedSub: Note: The modified subtitle file in the browser cache has not been synchronized to the server yet. Clicking 'Confirm' will upload it to the server and will automatically backup the original .srt file on the server; Clicking 'Cancel' will use the subtitle file from the server and update the cache.
repeater.saveUnsavedFav: Note: The modified config file (PDJ-Repeater.txt) in the browser cache has not been synchronized to the server yet. Clicking 'Confirm' will upload it to the server; Clicking 'Cancel' will use the config file from the server and update the cache.

repeater.instruction2: DoubleClick (UP arrow key on keyboard): stop playing
repeater.instruction3: Swipe Left or RIGHT arrow key on keyboard or button
repeater.instruction4: Swipe Right or LEFT arrow key on keyboard or button
repeater.instruction5: Swipe Up: add to favorites (Or remove a favorite when playing Favorite List)
repeater.instruction7: : switch Playback Mode among 'Single Sentence Repetition Mode', 'Dictation and Shadowing Recording Mode' and 'Regular Mode'. These icons in red indicate the media file stored in the browser cache is being played (No consumption of Internet traffic).

repeater.learnLangUsingPDJ: To Learn A Language Using PDJ Media Repeater
repeater.learnLang1: There are two very effective methods to learn a language: Shadowing and Reciting. For shadowing, you need listen to a sentence firstly, and then repeat it yourself immediately (maybe in mind). For reciting, you need read or listen to a sentence in your mother language firstly, and then translate to the new language immediately.
repeater.learnLang2: The key to the success of these two methods lies in REPETITION, a large amount of REPETITION, until a permanent conditioned reflex is formed! For the same sentence, you need to repeat shadowing and reciting it again and again (maybe 100 times in a year) to make it as familiar as your mother language. This is a boring and time-consuming job with no obvious effects in short time.
repeater.learnLang3: With PDJ Media Repeater, you can do shadowing and reciting easier, and the 'Review' function will ensure that you can obtain efficient and sufficient repetition times. Just choose a video or audio with 20-50 sentences every week, and repeat shadowing and reciting them every morning and evening 2 or 3 times. You can lie in your bed, close your eyes, and click, or swipe left, up in your cell phone to learn the language. Thus, in one year, you may master thousands of sentences as fluent as your mother language. That will be a big improvement.
repeater.cannotRecording: Recording unavailable. Microphone access permission denied.
repeater.uploadDicRec: Upload Dictation & Shadowing Recordings to Server
repeater.downloadDicRec: Download Dictation & Shadowing Recordings from Server to Browser Cache
repeater.confirmUploadDictation2: Comfirm upload of ALL dictation/shadowing recordings of this media file to server(For sharing with other browsers)? If these contents do not exist in the browser cache, the dictation content and shadowing recording on the server will be automatically cleared.
repeater.confirmDownloadDictation2: Confirm download of this media file's dictation/shadowing recordings from server to browser cache? If these contents do not exist on the server, the browser cache will be automatically cleared of dictation content and shadowing recordings.
repeater.failDownload: Download failed. Please check network connection.
repeater.failUpload: Upload failed. Check network and ensure this user has write/delete permissions.
repeater.confirmdeleteDicRec: Permanently delete ALL dictation/shadowing recordings of this media file (from both browser cache and server)? Dictation file on the server: {dictationFile}, shadowing recordings Dir on the server: {recordDir}
repeater.noRecordPermission: Microphone access denied due to browser security policy: Websites starting with 'http://' cannot access system microphones. Solutions: 1. For EDGE/Chrome in Windows/Mac/Android system: Visit chrome://flags/#unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure in address bar, then add this site's URL (with http:// and port), choose 'Enable' on the right side, and then restart the browser! Please search Internet for Other browsers' setting method. (All Browsers for IOS currently do not support this setting.) 2. Use the browser on the server and access via IP '127.0.0.1:PORT'. 3. Apply for 'https://' certification (a little bit complex) to enable microphone access universally.
repeater.delThisRevision2: Are you sure to delete this review?
repeater.removeRevisionConfirm: Unable to connect to the network, or the media file and subtitle file for this review have been moved or deleted on the server! Clicking 'confirm' will delete this review item. If necessary, please manually add again; Or click 'Cancel' to close and try again after connecting to the internet or in 'Offline APP Mode'.
repeater.confirmDelete: Are you sure to delete Current Sentence? (Using the shortcut 'ctrl + del' on a computer browser allows for direct execution without this confirmation.)
repeater.confirmMerge: Are you sure to merge Current Sentence to Next Sentence? (Using the shortcut 'shift + mouse left button click' on a computer browser allows for direct execution without this confirmation.)
repeater.confirmAdd: Are you sure to add a New Sentence after Current Sentence?
repeater.confirmSplit: Are you sure to split Current Sentence? (Using the shortcut 'ctrl + mouse left button click' on a computer browser allows for direct execution without this confirmation. And it can be precisely split at the click point)
repeater.infoMerge: Merge Current Sentence to Next Sentence
repeater.infoAdd: Add a New Sentence after Current Sentence
repeater.alertTranslatorUrl: The original contents of line {targetLine} will be cleared and can be restored by the undo button; the subtitle translation engine can be changed in 'Settings'; to check the language code, please visit: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/translator/language-support, or https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/azure/ai-services/translator/language-support. Note: Due to functional limitations, Azure translation service only provides sentence translation and may not translate individual words.
repeater.alertTranslatorUrl1: The subtitle translation function uses Microsoft Azure's free translation service. In addition to the default account provided here, users can also apply for a free Azure account (requiring a Visa or Mastercard international credit card, or student email), open the Translator Free (F0) service under Azure AI service, and replace the 'defaultKey,global,https://api.cognitive.microsofttranslator.com/' with your own 'subscription-Key,region,endpoint'. for example: azure-tts:d5da5b312758xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx,global,https://api.cognitive.microsofttranslator.com/
repeater.slowInternet: Slow Internet or Media Source switched! Replay...
repeater.toolsNote: * New file will be saved in folder /!PDJ/Repeater-backup/ under current user's root directory on the server.
repeater.tool1: 1.* Backup current .srt file to the server.
repeater.tool2: 2. Keep only the First Line of subtitles
repeater.tool3: 3. Keep only the Second Line of subtitles
repeater.tool4: 4. Keep only the First Line and Second Line of subtitles
repeater.tool5: 5. Swap the First Line and the Second Line
repeater.tool6: 6.* Generate a .txt plain text file without serial numbers and timestamps and save to the server
repeater.tool7: 7.* Generate a .txt plain text file without timestamps and save to the server
repeater.timeNote: Note: The above two parameters will only change the timestamps temporarily and will be not saved the real subtitle file. Before adjusting the timestamps of sentences in the editing mode, it is recommended to set the above two parameters to zero to avoid confusion.
repeater.speedNote: Note: The playback speed in Regular Mode will be set to the first value.
repeater.moveAllStamp: Move Whole TimeStamps forward(-) or backward(+) in ms:
repeater.RUdoAlert: Done! When restoring deleted or merged sentence, the favorite status may not be restored correctly, please adjust manually.
repeater.showWaveformInfo2: If it cause a mobile browser crash, please use a PC browser to generate it first.
repeater.cleanCacheDone: Selected caches have been cleaned up!
repeater.alertSpace: The remaining cache space for storing subtitles, configuration files, etc. in this browser is less than 200KB. Please clear the third cache item on the login page as soon as possible to avoid confusion in content reading. If necessary, you can first synchronize the unsaved subtitle files to the server in non Offline APP mode
repeater.cleanAccount: Clear the login info in browser cache. Then, login in 'Offline APP mode' will not be disabled.
repeater.cleanMedia: Clear cached media files and To Do List's attachments in the browser!
repeater.cleanSrtandSettings: Clear other files in browser cache, including subtitles, settings, To Do List and attachments that have been modified but may not have been synchronized to the server!
repeater.cleanAlert: Tip: Moving or deleting files on the server may make favorite sentences and review plans stored in the config file 'PDJ-Repeater.txt' in current user's /!PDJ folder on the server invalid! If necessary, please manually delete the 'PDJ-Repeater.txt' on the server, and re-add the favorite sentences and review plans.
repeater.wrongSrc: Media file loading failed! It has been moved on the server or there is an error in the media cache. Click 'confirm' to automatically cancel the favorite status of this sentence and clear the cached media. Or click 'cancel' to clear the cached media only.
repeater.noFavoriteFile: Unable to read the user config file '{favFileName}' in current user's /!PDJ folder on the server! If you are using the PDJ Media Repeater for the first time, please click 'confirm' and this config file will be automatically created; If it is due to network issues, please click 'Cancel' to exit, and try again after connecting to the internet or switching to 'Offline APP Mode'. The PDJ media repeater will automatically cache accessed data for offline use, which can be cleared on the login page. Meanwhile, when using the subtitle editing function in non Offline APP Mode, the original .srt file will be modified. If necessary, please make a backup in advance.
repeater.speechsynthesisAlert: Sorry, your browser does not support standard 'speechSynthesis API', and it can't utter the subtitle's translation line with system embedded TTS, this setting is disabled automatically. It is recommended to use a standard browser. Android phone users in China are recommended to use the original Firefox browser, which can call the system's built-in TTS service on Android phones without Google Framework.
repeater.warning1: Video or audeo tag is hijacked by this browser. This browser may not fully comply with HTML5 standard. Please restart your browser to retry. Or change to a standard browser: Edge, Chrome, Safari or Firefox to ensure PDJ Media Repeater can work correctly.

reminder.isBackUp: Automatically backup PDJ-ToDoList.txt to the folder !PDJ\ToDoList-attachments\backup when task content changes.
reminder.forgot1: Marked as 'to do'. The start date for this Recitation task has been reset to today and will restart this Recitation from the first day.
reminder.forgot2: Marked as 'to do'. As a Important task, this Recitation task will continue to be reminded tomorrow until 'Remembered' is clicked.
reminder.fromFirstDay: When clicking on 'forgotten' on the page of Recitation task, reset Today as the Recitation plan's start date and it will restart reciting from the first day. Otherwise, it will only be marked as 'To Do' (but if it is an important task, it will continue to be reminded the next day).
reminder.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to Delete Current Task?
reminder.markedAll: Mark all 'To Do' Tasks on current and previous dates as 'Done'
reminder.important1: Important Task: will be displayed in the Daily To Do List (in red) even if it's out of date but hasn't been done.
reminder.important2: Important Task: will be displayed in the Whole List in red color.
reminder.front: Front Side of the Task Card
reminder.back: Back Side of the Task Card
reminder.comingDate: Doublecheck the latest 4 coming Repitation Dates:
reminder.days: Num of Days from Start Date:
reminder.langinfrontside: Language in Task Card's Front Side:
reminder.langInbackside: Language in Task Card's Back Side:
reminder.unmatch: The PDJ-ToDoList.txt file on the server has been modified by another client. Click 'Confirm' to update the browser cache based on the server content. Click 'Cancel' to continue to use the cached content in this browser and save it to the server.
reminder.alert1: Front Page of the Task Card can't be empty!
reminder.alert2: Selected day of week can't be empty!
reminder.alert3: Date for Ebbinghaus Forgetting Curve can't be empty!
reminder.alert4: Date for Custom Dates can't be empty!
reminder.alert5: End Date should not be smaller than Start Date.
reminder.attachChanged: The attachments have been changed and saved. Cannot exit without saving. Please click the save button to exit the editing mode.
reminder.offlineApp: Offline APP mode - This mode can be used normally with or without a network: When there is a network, files in the browser cache will be prioritized for use. If there are no required files in the cache, they will be downloaded from the server and stored in the browser cache; This mode can also be used normally when there is no network (client cannot connect to the network or server is turned off), but only cached files can be used, and uncached files will not be displayed. This mode can still perform adding or editing Tasks, attachments when there is no network, and it will automatically update to the server after connecting to the server. When this mode is turned off, regardless of whether it is connected to the internet or whether there is a cache of the required files in the browser, an update cache request will be sent to the server. If it is not connected to the internet, an error page will be displayed.This mode will automatically log in using the cached account information. Please change this mode on the login page.
reminder.noTodoListFile: Unable to read the user config file '{favFileName}' in current user's /!PDJ folder on the server! If you are using the PDJ Universal To Do List for the first time, please click 'confirm' and this config file will be automatically created; If it is due to network issues, please click 'Cancel' to exit, and try again after connecting to the internet or switching to 'Offline APP Mode'. The PDJ Universal To Do List will automatically cache accessed data for offline use, which can be cleared on the login page.
reminder.uploadUnsaved: There are task contents and attachments that have been modified but not synchronized to the server. Clicking 'confirm' will attempt to synchronize to the server. If you want to abandon these modifications, please click 'Cancel' and clear all caches after logging out, and Re-login while connected to the server to rebuild the browser cache from the server.
reminder.ins01: Welcome to Use PDJ Universal To Do List!
reminder.ins04: 1. Select the Task Types, including Regular Task, Recitation Task, and Memo.
reminder.ins05: 2. Input contents of the Front Side and Back Side of the Task Card, and upload attachments (No limit to the size of each attachment, but attachments larger than 300 MB will not be cached in the browser and cannot be visited without network).
reminder.ins07: 4. Input Repitation Dates (Memo Task doesn't have Repitaion Dates). The PDJ Universal To Do List provides many Types of repitation dates.
reminder.ins08: 5. Input Task's Start Date, End Date and Execution Time. Then click the Save button to show it in the list.
reminder.ins10: to switch between 'Daily To Do List' and 'Whole List'.
reminder.ins11: 1. The search box at the top of the list page can be used to search for task content. Click on the
reminder.ins12: can quickly search for task types and tags.
reminder.ins13: 2. In the Daily To Do List, you can click on
reminder.ins15: 3. Memo tasks will not be displayed in the Daily To Do List.
reminder.ins16: 4. Clicking on each item in the list will take you to the Task Details page.
reminder.ins17: On the Task Details page, you can browse each task and perform editing and deleting operations.
reminder.ins18: 1. Swipe left or right to switch tasks.
reminder.ins19: 2. Swipe up and down to switch between the Front and Back Side of the Task Card.
reminder.ins20: 3. Single click on the page to read the content of the task card using TTS. Click on the attachment to display its contents.
reminder.ins21: 4. Double click on the page to enter the Task Editing page.
reminder.ins23: The PDJ Universal To Do List can be used both OnLine and OffLine (When using Offline, Offline APP Mode needs to be enabled on the Login page).
reminder.ins24: You can set the account language in the PDJ Media Repeater to change the display language of the PDJ Universal To Do List.
reminder.ins25: You can back up the complete PDJ Universal To Do List by backing up the !PDJ folder in the user's root directory on the server. All attachments are saved in !PDJ/ToDoList-attachments/ folder. And the PDJ Universal To Do List will automatically backup the file PDJ-ToDoList.txt to the folder !PDJ/ToDoList-attachments/backup after each task modification (Can be periodically deleted).

settings.allowEdit: Edit, rename and delete files or directories
settings.brandingHelp:
You can customize how your File Browser instance looks and feels by changing its name, replacing the logo, adding custom styles and even disable external links to GitHub.
For more information about custom branding, please check out the {0}.
settings.commandRunnerHelp: Here you can set commands that are executed in the named events. You must write one per line. The environment variables {0} and {1} will be available, being {0} relative to {1}. For more information about this feature and the available environment variables, please read the {2}.
settings.createUserDir: Auto create user home dir while adding new user
settings.tusUploadsHelp: File Browser supports chunked file uploads, allowing for the creation of efficient, reliable, resumable and chunked file uploads even on unreliable networks.
settings.tusUploadsChunkSize: Indicates to maximum size of a request (direct uploads will be used for smaller uploads). You may input a plain integer denoting byte size input or a string like 10MB, 1GB etc.
settings.tusUploadsRetryCount: Number of retries to perform if a chunk fails to upload.
settings.userHomeBasePath: Base path for user home directories
settings.userScopeGenerationPlaceholder: The scope will be auto generated
settings.defaultUserDescription: These are the default settings for new users.
settings.executeOnShellDescription: By default, File Browser executes the commands by calling their binaries directly. If you wish to run them on a shell instead (such as Bash or PowerShell), you can define it here with the required arguments and flags. If set, the command you execute will be appended as an argument. This applies to both user commands and event hooks.
settings.globalRules: This is a global set of allow and disallow rules. They apply to every user. You can define specific rules on each user's settings to override these ones.
settings.lockPassword: Prevent the user from changing the password

perm.rename: Rename or move files and directories

settings.permissionsHelp: You can set the user to be an administrator or choose the permissions individually. If you select "Administrator", all of the other options will be automatically checked. The management of users remains a privilege of an administrator.
settings.ruleExample1: prevents the access to any dotfile (such as .git, .gitignore) in every folder.
settings.ruleExample2: blocks the access to the file named Caddyfile on the root of the scope.
settings.rulesHelp: Here you can define a set of allow and disallow rules for this specific user. The blocked files won't show up in the listings and they wont be accessible to the user. We support regex and paths relative to the users scope.
settings.singleClick: Use single clicks to open files and directories
settings.userCommandsHelp: A space separated list with the available commands for this user. Example:
